description: A simple and fast noodle dish with spicy eggs.
name: Spicy Egg Fried Noodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g noodles, cooked as per packet instructions
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and fry for 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan and combine fully.
Cook the noodles as per packet instructions and then drain and add to the pan.
Fry and combine all ingredients while tossing for 3 minutes before plating.
Wipe pan clean adding a touch more sesame oil then crisp-fry the eggs and put on top of each dish.
